metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0843 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: The Qualcomm ARM processor performance-event manager in Android 4.x before4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-04-01allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internalbug 25801197.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
